typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as integer,
	pipeline_name as string,
	pkey_column as string,
	final_sql_query as string,
	column_metric_name as string,
	alert_type as string,
	pipeline_run_id as string,
	pipeline_trigger_time as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($final_sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> QCTable
QCTable derive(qc_id = $qc_id,
		sql_query = $final_sql_query,
		pipeline_name = $pipeline_name,
		pipeline_run_id = $pipeline_run_id,
		pipeline_trigger_time = toTimestamp('$pipeline_trigger_time','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> TestQuery
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		qc_id as integer,
		pipeline_name as string,
		pipeline_run_id as string,
		pipeline_trigger_time as timestamp,
		pkey_column_values as string,
		column_metric_error_values as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
